chapters.title: Chapter 1: The Flame of Tar Valon
chapters.info: Perrin Aybara, p. 7 (6)—A young man from Emond's Field, and a good friend of Rand al'Thor and Mat Cauthon. While he was staying with Elyas Machera, he found that he has the ability to talk to wolves. Once this ability manifested itself, his eyes took on the yellowish color of wolves' eyes. He is bigger than most people, a fact which greatly helped him as a blacksmith's apprentice, but the fact that he often underestimates his strength has caused him to be very cautious. He carries a large battle ax at his belt. See also al'Thor, Rand; Cauthon, Matrim; Young Bull.
